casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Marshall Tristan Shaw No. 302P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016. Mr. Bruce T. Cunningham, Jr., Mr. Robert A. Buzzard, Attorneys at Law, For Shaw, Marshall Tristan. Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ms. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Ms. Maureen Krueger, District Attorney, For State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 17th of August 2016 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Moore County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
